alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kewaunee and southern Door Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 707 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Oconto to 7 miles east of Sturgeon Bay. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sturgeon Bay around 710 PM CDT. Algoma around 745 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brussels, Rostok, Slovan, Gregorville, Rankin, Euren, Rosiere, Shoemaker Point, Duvall and Scarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
